name: EMBRYOLOGY_SPECIMEN
description: Contains information about oocyte, embryo, or sperm specimens.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the specimen record.

columns.name: REI_SPEC_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: The state of a specimen in an embryology or andrology lab. This tracks whether a specimen is currently in-culture, frozen, discarded, etc.
